output: For each test case, print a line containing a single integer indicating the minimum number of bar measures the song can have. If it is not possible to have all members singing the same note, then print the value−1.
input:
The input contains several test cases. The first line of a test case contains an 
	integer N (2 ≤ N ≤ 104) indicating the number of members of the choir. 
	Notes are indicated by integers. The second line contains N integers, indicating the note (−105 ≤ notai ≤105) where 0 ≤ i ≤ N−1, that each singer must sing at the beginning of the song. Notes are given in non-decreasing order  (notai ≤notai+1).
name: Perfect Choir
